Fitness

Personal Training Inquiries: nathansuon@gmail.com

This is a subheading

Training to me has always been a journey to be the best I could be at something. The thing is, each time I started something new I always ended up moving on to something else. It was never just a quit right away thing, I had always advanced to at least an intermediate level before moving on to a new challenge. Maybe the thing was that I really liked starting from scratch. Experiencing that struggle over and over again allowed me to keep the perspective that I was still a student.
